`php -d opcache.enable_cli=true Spake.php`

will return:

```
string(22) "CLIENT GET SERVER DATA"
string(75) "769002269322123564177291153246194160941251142130204139923711223118822169588"
string(82) "1461316619116120361988124824518210317043234220815018875149170149854713355498699226"
string(22) "SERVER GET CLIENT DATA"
string(75) "769002269322123564177291153246194160941251142130204139923711223118822169588"
string(82) "1461316619116120361988124824518210317043234220815018875149170149854713355498699226"
bool(true)
bool(true)
```
